KSP RULES ADDENDUM 23TH MAY 2012

New rule

94: If you make any mods or plugins or any other extra content for KSP, you need to publish it (following the guidelines) on the official KSP forums. 

New suggested limit

Suggested limit 1: Don\'t kill more 1000 Kerbals a day.

Rule 95. Deep Space Kraken\'s *alive.* Period.

No matter *who* claims to have this beast killed >![:(](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_sad.gif)

96: Don\'t remake your creations of KSP in real life rockets. 

Suggested limit 2: Suggested limit rule 96: Small remakes (no bigger than 20cm per part) are possible, as long as they don\'t contain any fuel, explosives or other dangerous material.
